column3: Hi, TIC groceries! How may I help?
Hi Pascale! It's Ethan Green again.
Oh, Mr Green.  Nice to speak to you.
Any recommendations today?  The vegetables you delivered last time were excellent.
Thank you sir, um we have everything you bought last time.  Would you like a repeat order?
Anything to add to it?  Grapes or watermelons.
Um… let me think… no, I'm happy with the others.
Excellent sir, I'll have that added to your bill and delivered in the next run.
Thanks Pascale it's always nice to speak to you.
You too sir, have an excellent day.
